column4: hi,i've download alsa-source by synaptic but i don't know how to install it.can anyone help me?
hi,i've download alsa-source by synaptic but i don't know how to install it.can anyone help me?
If I understand correctly the "source" packages are not installable, they are source code, you compile them, and if you are a newbie you have no business with them.
aptitude search <package>  "aptitude show <package>"  "man aptitude"  "man apt-get" "man apt-cache" is all info you need
